Kings and Queens is on 3 different albums in the torrent. One is 3:46 (Greatest Hits) 3:48 (Draw The Line) & 5:33 (Pandora's Box Disc 3). Cheers!

Here is the link to my "GOOD COPY" of "Nine Lives" to replace the bad copy in this torrent. Thanks.

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5832682/Aerosmith_-_Nine_Lives_(1997)Mp3_320_vtwin88cube__GOOD_COPY_

I really hate to be the asshole here, but all the albums except for Permanent Vacation have all the high frequencies brick walled (meaning there was a filter applied to wipe out the highs) to the point that the files are worse than 128Kbps. Either these were upconverted from a horrible copy or the filter makes the bitrate absolutely irrelevant.

I mean I wouldn't complain about the highest of highs because most can't appreciate or tell what that does, but there is absolutely no fidelity on these copies.

A appreciate it man, but this is seriously the worst encoding I have ever seen, compressed down to 8-track levels of muddiness. Where are the cymbals?
my wife is crazy of his deep voice, the american jagger. u rock dude
sorry vtwin but the quality is SO bad, it actually seems you downloaded a 128kbps discography and converted it to 320, sorry bro
^ I HATE making comments like that :( especially to such a well organised and pretty discography..

It's interesting the varied comments that I received on this torrent. I believe some of it is good & some of it is not so good.
This was my very first upload. Trust me, my uploads are a lot better now. All comments are always welcome on any of my torrents. Don't feel bad telling me that it sucks if it does! Practice makes perfect. Cheers!

I actuallly kind of want to take it back now, when I downloaded albums "Gold" and "Pandora's box", quality was excellent, but "Get a grip" was horrid. Nonetheless this is an OUTSTANDING collection which is beautifully organised.
